特記事項: 本授業科目は、“オンライン授業60単位制限対象科目”ではありません。 The course is not subject to the 60-credit limit for online courses.
授業方法:
*The format and schedule may change during the semester, depending on student needs, interests, numbers and the evolving coronavirus situation.

Each class will focus on one or two skill area that is necessary for the IELTS test. Students will be expected to come to class having completed their homework and studied vocabulary words for the week. The class will be conducted face-to-face. However, assignments/homework/assessments will be conducted, and lesson information/resources provided, on Google Classroom or other online platforms. As such, students will need access to a computer at home AND a Gmail account. BYOD to class is recommended.

Outside of class:
- For all class periods you will be required to complete homework assignments. Be sure to attempt all these assignments as they reinforce language, skills and assess knowledge of content covered in class.
- Review each lesson, and check any new content, language or skills learned.
- Access any online material required. Some assignments may involve online research.
- You should expect to spend about 1~2 hours doing homework per class period.
- Do not hesitate to contact me if you need any help, I'm happy to speak to you.
